Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 29 points in as many minutes.
Chet Holmgren matched Shai Gilgeous-Alexander's point total with 29 points.
Alex Caruso made two 3-pointers on three attempts after being 3 for 21 on the season from deep.
The Thunder scored a season-high 75 points in the first half.
The Thunder made 14 free throws on 15 attempts in the first half.
The Thunder's defense caused a significant lead in the second quarter.
Houston's Alperen Sengun had a poor performance with 11 points on 3-for-12 shooting.
Jalen Green went 1 for 8 after the first quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander reflected on his performance, stating he tries to take what the defense gives him every night.
Chet Holmgren noted Steven Adams' gentle but effective moves.
